Package mdd.operations

Class Operation

  • java.lang.Object
    • mdd.operations.Operation
  • public class Operation
extends java.lang.Object
    The class dedicated to perform classical operation on and between MDDs

        public static MDD intersection​(MDD mdd1,
                               MDD mdd2)
        Perform an intersection between mdd1 and mdd2. Create a new MDD to stock the result.
        Parameters:
        mdd1 - The first MDD
        mdd2 - The second MDD
        Returns:
        The result of the intersection between mdd1 and mdd2

      • intersection

                               MDD mdd1,
                               MDD mdd2)
        Perform an intersection between mdd1 and mdd2. Stock the result in the given result MDD.
        Parameters:
        result - The MDD to stock the result
        mdd1 - The first MDD
        mdd2 - The second MDD
        Returns:
        The result of the intersection between mdd1 and mdd2

      • intersection

        public static MDD intersection​(MDD mdd1,
                               MDD mdd2,
                               int start,
                               int stop,
                               int size)
        Perform an intersection between mdd1 and mdd2 from layer start to layer stop. Create a new MDD to stock the result.
        Parameters:
        mdd1 - The first MDD
        mdd2 - The second MDD
        start - The starting layer
        stop - The stopping layer
        size - The size of the result
        Returns:
        The result of the intersection between mdd1 and mdd2 from layer start to layer stop.

      • intersection

        public static MDD intersection​(MDD result,
                               MDD mdd1,
                               MDD mdd2,
                               int start,
                               int stop,
                               int size)
        Perform an intersection between mdd1 and mdd2 from layer start to layer stop. Stock the result in the given result MDD.
        Parameters:
        result - The MDD that will stock the result of the operation
        mdd1 - The first MDD
        mdd2 - The second MDD
        start - The starting layer
        stop - The stopping layer
        size - The size of the result
        Returns:
        The result of the intersection between mdd1 and mdd2 from layer start to layer stop.

      • concatenate

        public static MDD concatenate​(MDD mdd1,
                              MDD mdd2)
        Perform a concatenation of the two MDD. That is to say, the tt node of mdd1 will be replaced by the root node from mdd2. Create a new MDD to stock the result
        Parameters:
        mdd1 - The first MDD (top)
        mdd2 - The second MDD (bottom)
        Returns:
        The result of the concatenate operation.

        Perform the union of mdd1 and mdd2. Create a new MDD to stock the result.
        Parameters:
        mdd1 - The first MDD
        mdd2 - The second MDD
        Returns:
        the union of mdd1 and mdd2.

        Parameters:

      • inclusion

        public static boolean inclusion​(MDD mdd1,
                                MDD mdd2)
        Check if mdd2 is included in mdd1.
        Parameters:
        mdd1 - The first MDD
        mdd2 - The second MDD
        Returns:
        true if mdd2 is included in mdd1, false otherwise

      • inclusion

        public static boolean inclusion​(Node root1,
                                Node root2,
                                int size)
        Check if the sub-MDD of the given size starting from node root2 is included in the sub-MDD starting from node root1 of the given size.
        Parameters:
        root1 - The first root
        root2 - The second root
        size - The size of both sub-MDDs
        Returns:
        true if there is an inclusion, false otherwise

      • addArcAndNode

        public static Node addArcAndNode​(MDD mdd,
                                 Node x,
                                 Node y1,
                                 Node y2,
                                 int label,
                                 int layer,
                                 Binder binder)
        Add an arc and a node to the given MDD
        Parameters:
        mdd - The MDD where the node will be added
        x - The source node
        y1 - The child of the first associated node to x (x1), corresponding to the given label
        y2 - The child of the second associated node to x (x2), corresponding to the given label
        label - Label of the arc to add
        layer - index of the layer where the node will be added
        binder - The binder
        Returns:
        The node added

      • concatenate

        public static MDD concatenate​(ArrayOfMDD mdds)
        Perform the concatenation of multiple MDDs. Create a new MDD to stock the result. The operation is performed in chain, so the first MDD will me on top and the last on bottom.
        Parameters:
        mdds - The array of all MDDs
        Returns:
        The concatenation of all the MDDs

      • union

        public static MDD union​(ArrayOfMDD mdds)
        Perform the union of multiple MDDs Create a new MDD to stock the result.
        Parameters:
        mdds - The array of all MDDs
        Returns:
        the union of all the MDDs.

      • intersection

        public static MDD intersection​(ArrayOfMDD mdds)
        Perform the intersection of multiple MDDs Create a new MDD to stock the result.
        Parameters:
        mdds - The array of all MDDs
        Returns:
        the intersection of all the MDDs.

      • intersection

        public static MDD intersection​(MDD result,
                               ArrayOfMDD mdds)
        Perform the intersection of multiple MDDs Stock the result in the given result MDD.
        Parameters:
        result - The MDD that will stock the result of the operation
        mdds - The array of all MDDs
        Returns:
        the intersection of all the MDDs.

      • addArcAndNode

        public static void addArcAndNode​(MDD mdd,
                                 Node x,
                                 ArrayOfNode ys,
                                 int label,
                                 int layer,
                                 Binder binder)
        Add an arc and a node to the given MDD
        Parameters:
        mdd - The MDD where the node will be added
        x - The source node
        ys - The child of the associated nodes to x, corresponding to the given label
        label - Label of the arc to add
        layer - index of the layer where the node will be added
        binder - The binder
